title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
created_time: July 01, 2022, 02:20:59 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 05:41:21 PM by Gianluca95
content: BCH.games is really happy to present its first signature campaign !ANN THREAD: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5311987.0Total Available Spots: 15Full Member Spots available: 5 - 25$/WeekSr/Hero Member: 5 - 40$/WeekLegendary Member: 5 - 50$/WeekRules:Negative trust members are not allowed. Users that receive valid negative trust from DT2 or above while enrolled will be kicked and payment denied.Only constructive posts will be counted. Please do at least 25 quality post/week in way to be elegible for paymentPlease do at least 10 quality post/week in gambling section in way to be elegible for paymentWe don't accept 1 day poster. Please, be constant with your posts, or you won't be paid.1 account per user. Any user found to have alts in the campaign will be kicked and denied payment.Posts in Local, Games & rounds, Off topic, Micro earnings, investor based games, and other signature campaign thread will not be counted.Posts in Beginners and help, speculation, and politics and society will count as half.No other signatures are allowed to be worn while you are in the campaign.Users found to spamm will be banned from the campaign and payment will be denied.Posts will be counted and payments will be made on fridays.Week will end on friday at the 13:00 AM (FORUM TIME), so, please, ensure that you've followed every requirement for that day.Notes:Payments will be directly processed by me.In the case of a rank up, a new slot will only be available if the total enrolled members does not exceed the maximum (15 users).Any rule changes / updates will be posted in the following post. it is your responsibility to check in case of any updates. Post quality will be the main priority in this campaign. Not reaching payout threshold for 2 weeks in a row will result in being kicked from the campaign and being banned from reapplying for 1 week.*I am only managing the campaign. I am not affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts. If you want to join, first wear the signature based on your rank, then fill this form with the following informations:QuoteName:Post count:Rank:BTC Segwit Address:Profile UID:Then, check here  if
